app.source.utente.UtenteControl module¶

login()[source]¶

reads a user login credentials from a http request and if they are valid logs the user in with those same credentials,changing his state from anonymous user to logged user :return: tbd

logout()[source]¶
logs a user out, changing his state from logged user to anonymous user

:return:tbd

signup()[source]¶
Reads the user credentials from a http request and adds him to the project database
return

tbd

signup_newsletter()[source]¶
changes the User ,whose email was passed as a http request parameter ,newsletter flag to true
return

tbd

test_signupEmptyToken()[source]¶

test the sign-up functionality of the website, creating a dummy account with an empty and verifying it was correctly registered as a user and the token was correctly parsed to Null
